He is now divorcing his wife, Marla, largely because under the terms of their prenuptial agreement, she'd be entitled to a huge chunk of his fortune if they stayed married another year.
He is now divorcing his wife, Marla, largely because under the terms of their prenuptial agreement, she'd be entitled to a huge chunk of his fortune if they stayed married another year.

An article warns that Russia is losing control of its nuclear weapons: Its early warning system is disintegrating and the soldiers who man the missiles aren't being paid, raising the possibility of nukes being sold to terrorists.

Steven Spielberg takes Time 's cover as he ends a three-year absence from the screen with three new movies, including The Lost World , a sequel to Jurassic Park . The article concludes the 50-year-old Spielberg has grown up since E.T. , but not too much: He's still a boy at heart.
